parameter.value: Don't push me, don't push me. One after another, |PLAYERNAME|.
Aww, I don't even deserve a farewell?
Bon appetit, and come back soon for your daily dose of vitamins!
Bon appetit, and come back soon for your daily dose of vitamins!
Bon appetit, and come back soon for your daily dose of vitamins!
You should really prefer my fruits over all this fat meat offered elsewhere. They keep you lithe and lissom.
Sorry, but that's not enough money, please count again.
